data.title: Frozen Desserts Distributor & Maker
data.meta_description: For over 100 years, Perry's Ice Cream makes and distributes premium ice cream and frozen desserts. Find where to buy ice cream near you today!
data.text:
Happy National Ice Cream Month!

It’s our favorite month of the year – National Ice Cream Month is here! Each year we raise a cone to celebrate our favorite treat in the entire world: ice cream! The Scoop on National Ice […]

Batter Up Bucs Fans! The Pittsburgh Pirates and Perry’s Ice Cream Launch New Flavor

The Pittsburgh Pirates have officially announced the launch of a new custom ice cream flavor in collaboration with Perry’s Ice Cream. With Bucs fans in mind, Perry’s, the Official Ice Cream of the Pittsburgh Pirates, […]

The scoop on extra indulgent ice cream

A richer, creamier ice cream that’s packed full of the good stuff—that’s what we mean when we say, “extra indulgent.” Whether you’re diving into one of our 13 extra indulgent pints or trying our brand […]

Your Summer Guide to Ice Cream Stand Flavors!

It’s that time of year again! The weather is getting warmer, the birds are chirping, and you’re looking for activities and outings for the whole family. At Perry’s Ice Cream, our favorite summer outing is always […]

Partners in Sustainability: Eco-Friendly Ice Cream Packaging

At Perry’s, we lead by the timeless mantra of our founder H. Morton Perry: “Make sure you put in enough of the good stuff.” This philosophy not only applies to our ice cream, but our […]
